author: Huawei
description:
Fiber to the Room (FTTR) solutions are reshaping broadband in Africa. FTTR innovations are turning connectivity into a full digital platform for homes and small businesses. At #AfricaCom 2025, #Huawei showcased its #FTTR solutions including room-by-room fiber, smart Wi-Fi management, and SME service bundles. 
 
Learn how these innovations simplify operations and empower smart-home connectivity: https://bit.ly/3JTiLoX
title: FTTR Powers Africa's Next Wave of Digital Connectivity

author: Huawei
description: Through every image, stories come to life. Relive the HUAWEI XMAGE Awards 2025 Ceremony & Annual Exhibition, and celebrate moments captured through the lens. https://bit.ly/4471iQA #HUAWEIXMAGE #TheWorldYouandMe #Huawei
title: HUAWEI XMAGE Awards 2025 Ceremony & Annual Exhibition Highlights
